Parameters.Name: SCHEDULE-5-1-8-v15.06 GET SPECIAL DAY GROUPS WITH INVALID TOKEN

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-5-1-8-v15.06 GET SPECIAL DAY GROUPS WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-5-1-8-v15.06 GET SPECIAL DAY GROUPS WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response (empty specialgroup list)
Test.Description: 8. If specialgroupCompleteList is empty, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-5-1-8-v15.06 GET SPECIAL DAY GROUPS WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response (MaxLimit = 1)
Test.Description: 10. If cap.MaxLimit less than 2, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-5-1-8-v15.06 GET SPECIAL DAY GROUPS WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetSpecialDayGroups (wrong token)
Test.Description: 15. If specialdaygroupList[0].token does not equal to specialgroupCompleteList[0].token, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-5-1-8-v15.06 GET SPECIAL DAY GROUPS WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetSpecialDayGroups (wrong items number)
Test.Description: 14. If specialdaygroupList contains more than one item, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-5-1-8-v15.06 GET SPECIAL DAY GROUPS WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetSpecialDayGroups (empty list)
Test.Description: 13. If specialdaygroupList is empty, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: SCHEDULE-5-1-8-v15.06 GET SPECIAL DAY GROUPS WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: first GetSpecialDayGroups (not empty list)
Test.Description: 7. If specialdaygroupList is not empty, FAIL the test.

Test.Name: Fault: second GetSpecialDayGroups
